attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into the MP's who work against the will of the people
attributes.additional_details:
LEAVE MEANS LEAVE
THE COUNTRY HAS VOTED TO LEAVE
Hold a public enquiry (especially into their own financial interests within the EU) into the MP's who are working against the will of the people in respect of Brexit as the people pay their wages,  and dismiss them from Parliament forever for working against the will of the people and the Democratic vote to LEAVE
attributes.background: Hold a public enquiry (especially into their own financial interests within the EU) into the MP's who are working against the will of the people in respect of Brexit ,  and dismiss them from Parliament forever for working against the will of the people and the Democratic vote to LEAVE

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to consider signing one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245297

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
